name: 陳擎文
objective:
本課程旨在介紹生產業與服務業中之作業管理。其中包含預測、產品與服務設計、產能規劃、地點選擇規劃分析、存貨管理、及時系統與供應鏈管理、專案管理、及品質管理，並針對顧客導向、環境永續、精實供應鏈、及電子化企業等影響當代作業管理的重要議題。此外，有鑑於新科技帶動全球產品與生產技術的創新，如虛擬實境技術、協作機器人、3D 列印、行動支付、特斯拉電動車等案例加以介紹討論，以增進學生對於科技趨勢的認識。
The course is aimed at operations management in the industrial service industry. Including forecasting product and service design design design, capacity capacity planning, location selection selection selection planning planning, inventory inventory management customer-oriented sustainable lean and lean supply chain, and other important issues affecting contemporary management . . In addition, in view of the fact that in view of the case of 3D printing, driving payment, Tesla electric vehicles and other cases will be introduced and discussed, in order to increase Students' awareness of technological trends.
